name: Ghost Blaster
description:
This game was made during the Philly Game Jam: Ghost of Gaming's Past.

Game was about a witch helping her red pac-man ghost, rescue his friends and save his one true love, Boo.

This game was created by:

Programmer: Daniel Jung

Character Artist: Sean Tate

Music/SFX: Rob Miller

Scene Manager: Ben Monaco

Project Manager/Programmer:Kotaro Fujita

This game never went past game jam phase but was an awesome experience to make.
